Posts.EditableText: Is there an actual adult category that you are able to access, or do you have to just find an adult game and click on the adult tag while viewing it?
Posts.HTML: Is there an actual adult category that you are able to access, or do you have to just find an adult game and click on the adult tag while viewing it?

Posts.EditableText: You can change the url to access adult games: http://textadventures.co.uk/games/tag/adult
Posts.HTML: You can change the url to access adult games: http://textadventures.co.uk/games/tag/adult
